SELECT_SQL:
SELECT
	ROLE_ID,
	ROLE_CODE,
	ROLE_NAME,
	DESCRIPTION,
	(select MNU_GROUP_CODE from xip_pub_mnu_group where MNU_GROUP_ID = t.mnu_group_id) MNU_GROUP_CODE,
	ENABLE_FLAG,
        ATTRIBUTE1
FROM xip_pub_role t where t.ROLE_CODE like 'XC_%'
INSERT_SQL:
insert into xip_pub_role
(      ROLE_ID,
	ROLE_CODE,
	ROLE_NAME,
	DESCRIPTION,
	MNU_GROUP_ID,
	ENABLE_FLAG,
  ATTRIBUTE1,
  CREATION_DATE
)values
(
       ${sys.uuid},
	${ROLE_CODE},
	${ROLE_NAME},
	${DESCRIPTION},
	(select MNU_GROUP_ID from xip_pub_mnu_group where MNU_GROUP_CODE=${MNU_GROUP_CODE}),
	${ENABLE_FLAG},
        ${ATTRIBUTE1},
        ${sys.date}
)
UPDATE_SQL:
update  xip_pub_role
set ROLE_NAME=${ROLE_NAME},
    DESCRIPTION=${DESCRIPTION},
    MNU_GROUP_ID=(select MNU_GROUP_ID from xip_pub_mnu_group where MNU_GROUP_CODE=${MNU_GROUP_CODE}),
    ENABLE_FLAG=${ENABLE_FLAG},
    ATTRIBUTE1=${ATTRIBUTE1},
    LAST_UPDATE_DATE=${sys.date}
where ROLE_CODE = ${ROLE_CODE}

SELECT_SQL:
SELECT
  (select MNU_GROUP_CODE from xip_pub_mnu_group where mnu_group_id = t.mnu_group_id) AS MNU_GROUP_CODE,
  t.MNU_TREE_CODE,
  (select MNU_TREE_CODE from xip_pub_mnu_tree where MNU_ID = t.UP_ID) AS UP_MNU_CODE
 from xip_pub_mnu_tree t
where t.MNU_TREE_CODE like 'XC_%'
  and (t.UP_ID is not null and t.UP_ID <> '-1')
UPDATE_SQL:
update xip_pub_mnu_tree
set UP_ID =(select temp.mnu_id from (select MNU_ID from xip_pub_mnu_tree where MNU_GROUP_ID= (select MNU_GROUP_ID from xip_pub_mnu_group where MNU_GROUP_CODE = ${MNU_GROUP_CODE}) and MNU_TREE_CODE =${UP_MNU_CODE}) temp)
where MNU_TREE_CODE = ${MNU_TREE_CODE}
  and MNU_GROUP_ID= (select MNU_GROUP_ID from xip_pub_mnu_group where MNU_GROUP_CODE = ${MNU_GROUP_CODE})

SELECT_SQL:
SELECT FORM_ID,
       FORM_URL,
       FORM_DESC,
       APP_ID,
       ENTITY_ID,
       ENABLE_FLAG,
       CLIENT_TYPE
  FROM XIP_WF_PROCESS_FORMS T
 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1
          FROM XIP_PUB_APPS A
         WHERE T.APP_ID = A.APP_ID
           AND A.APP_CODE = 'XC' )
INSERT_SQL:
INSERT INTO XIP_WF_PROCESS_FORMS
  (FORM_ID,
   FORM_URL,
   FORM_DESC,
   APP_ID,
   ENTITY_ID,
   ENABLE_FLAG,
   CLIENT_TYPE)
VALUES
  (${FORM_ID},
   ${FORM_URL},
   ${FORM_DESC},
   ${APP_ID},
   ${ENTITY_ID},
   ${ENABLE_FLAG},
   ${CLIENT_TYPE})
UPDATE_SQL:
UPDATE XIP_WF_PROCESS_FORMS
   SET FORM_URL          = ${FORM_URL},
       FORM_DESC         = ${FORM_DESC},
       APP_ID            = ${APP_ID},
       ENTITY_ID         = ${ENTITY_ID},
       ENABLE_FLAG       = ${ENABLE_FLAG},
       CLIENT_TYPE       = ${CLIENT_TYPE}
 WHERE FORM_ID = ${FORM_ID}

SELECT_SQL:
select (select DEPT_CODE from xip_pub_depts where DEPT_ID = t.TARGET_ID) DEPT_CODE,
       (select FUN_TREE_CODE from xip_pub_fun_tree where FUN_TREE_ID = t.FUN_TREE_ID) FUN_TREE_CODE
from xip_pub_user_funs t
where TYPE = 'D'
INSERT_SQL:
insert into xip_pub_user_funs
  (user_fun_id, type, target_id, fun_tree_id)
values
  (${sys.uuid},'D',(select DEPT_ID from xip_pub_depts where DEPT_CODE = ${DEPT_CODE}),(select FUN_TREE_ID from xip_pub_fun_tree where FUN_TREE_CODE = ${FUN_TREE_CODE}))
UPDATE_SQL:
update xip_pub_user_funs
SET LAST_UPDATE_DATE = LAST_UPDATE_DATE
where TYPE = 'D'
  and TARGET_ID = (select DEPT_ID from xip_pub_depts where DEPT_CODE = ${DEPT_CODE})
  and FUN_TREE_ID = (select FUN_TREE_ID from xip_pub_fun_tree where FUN_TREE_CODE = ${FUN_TREE_CODE})

from xip_pub_param_vals pv
where pv.VAL_LEVEL='U'

UPDATE_SQL:
update xip_pub_param_vals
set VAL=${VAL},
    ENABLE_FLAG=${ENABLE_FLAG},
    LAST_UPDATE_DATE=${sys.date}
where PARAM_ID=(select pa.PARAM_ID from xip_pub_params pa where pa.PARAM_CODE = ${PARAM_CODE})
  and VAL_LEVEL=${VAL_LEVEL}
  and TARGET_ID=(select USER_ID from xip_pub_users where USER_NAME =${USER_NAME})

SELECT_SQL:
SELECT
ft.FUN_TREE_ID,
ft.FUN_TREE_CODE,
ft.FUN_TREE_NAME,
ft.UP_ID,
ft.NODE_TYPE,
ft.NODE_ORDER,
ft.ENABLE_FLAG,
ft.DESCRIPTION,
ft.URL,
ft.SMALL_ICON,
ft.LARGE_ICON,
ft.FUN_HELP,
(select pa.APP_CODE from xip_pub_apps pa where pa.APP_ID=ft.APP_ID) as APP_CODE,
ft.MOB_URL,
ft.SHOW_STYLE
from xip_pub_fun_tree ft
INSERT_SQL:
insert into xip_pub_fun_tree(FUN_TREE_ID,FUN_TREE_CODE,FUN_TREE_NAME,NODE_TYPE,NODE_ORDER,ENABLE_FLAG,DESCRIPTION,URL,SMALL_ICON,LARGE_ICON,APP_ID,MOB_URL,FUN_HELP,CREATION_DATE,SHOW_STYLE)
values(${sys.uuid},${FUN_TREE_CODE},${FUN_TREE_NAME},${NODE_TYPE},${NODE_ORDER},${ENABLE_FLAG},${DESCRIPTION},${URL},${SMALL_ICON},${LARGE_ICON},(select APP_ID from xip_pub_apps where app_code=${APP_CODE}),${MOB_URL},${FUN_HELP},${sys.date},${SHOW_STYLE})
UPDATE_SQL:
UPDATE xip_pub_fun_tree
SET  FUN_TREE_NAME=${FUN_TREE_NAME},
     NODE_TYPE=${NODE_TYPE},
     NODE_ORDER=${NODE_ORDER},
     ENABLE_FLAG=${ENABLE_FLAG},
     DESCRIPTION=${DESCRIPTION},
     URL=${URL},
     SMALL_ICON=${SMALL_ICON},
     LARGE_ICON=${LARGE_ICON},
     APP_ID=(select APP_ID from xip_pub_apps where app_code=${APP_CODE}),
     MOB_URL=${MOB_URL},
     FUN_HELP =${FUN_HELP},
     LAST_UPDATE_DATE=${sys.date},
     SHOW_STYLE = ${SHOW_STYLE}
WHERE FUN_TREE_CODE=${FUN_TREE_CODE}

SELECT
(select MNU_GROUP_CODE from xip_pub_mnu_group where mnu_group_id = t.mnu_group_id) AS MNU_GROUP_CODE,
t.NAME,

SELECT_SQL:
SELECT 
  (SELECT 
    t.MNU_TREE_CODE 
  FROM
    xip_pub_mnu_tree t 
  WHERE t.MNU_ID = l.MNU_ID) MNU_TREE_CODE,
  (SELECT 
    g.MNU_GROUP_CODE 
  FROM
    xip_pub_mnu_group g 
  WHERE g.MNU_GROUP_ID = l.MNU_GROUP_ID) MNU_GROUP_CODE,
  l.FUN_CODE,
  l.FUN_LANG,
  l.FUN_LANG_VAL 
FROM
  XIP_PUB_MENUGROUP_LANGUAGE l
INSERT_SQL:
INSERT INTO XIP_PUB_MENUGROUP_LANGUAGE 
  (
    MNU_ID,
    MNU_GROUP_ID,
    FUN_CODE,
    FUN_LANG,
    FUN_LANG_VAL
  ) 
VALUES
  (
    (SELECT t.MNU_ID FROM xip_pub_mnu_tree t WHERE t.MNU_TREE_CODE = ${MNU_TREE_CODE} AND t.MNU_GROUP_ID = (SELECT p.MNU_GROUP_ID FROM xip_pub_mnu_group p WHERE p.MNU_GROUP_CODE = ${MNU_GROUP_CODE})),
    (SELECT mp.MNU_GROUP_ID FROM xip_pub_mnu_group mp WHERE mp.MNU_GROUP_CODE = ${MNU_GROUP_CODE}),
    ${FUN_CODE},
    ${FUN_LANG},
    ${FUN_LANG_VAL}
  )

SELECT_SQL:
SELECT
  (select MNU_GROUP_CODE from xip_pub_mnu_group where mnu_group_id = t.mnu_group_id) AS MNU_GROUP_CODE,
  t.MNU_TREE_CODE,
  (select MNU_TREE_CODE from xip_pub_mnu_tree where MNU_ID = t.UP_ID) AS UP_MNU_CODE
 from xip_pub_mnu_tree t
where t.MNU_TREE_CODE is not null
  and (t.UP_ID is not null and t.UP_ID <> '-1')
UPDATE_SQL:
update xip_pub_mnu_tree
set UP_ID =(select temp.mnu_id from (select MNU_ID from xip_pub_mnu_tree where MNU_GROUP_ID= (select MNU_GROUP_ID from xip_pub_mnu_group where MNU_GROUP_CODE = ${MNU_GROUP_CODE}) and MNU_TREE_CODE =${UP_MNU_CODE}) temp)
where MNU_TREE_CODE = ${MNU_TREE_CODE}
  and MNU_GROUP_ID= (select MNU_GROUP_ID from xip_pub_mnu_group where MNU_GROUP_CODE = ${MNU_GROUP_CODE})
